content: Green urges Orange to cease its offensive against Purple and come to the negotiating table. Further violence will only breed more instability.
Green offers its condolences for the lives lost and damage inflicted. We believe in a peaceful resolution to this conflict and are ready to assist through mediation.
Green calls upon the global community to avoid escalatory rhetoric and actions. Diplomacy and de-escalation are the only paths forward.
Green again urges Orange to cease hostilities against Purple and negotiate a peaceful resolution. Further aggression will only isolate Orange diplomatically.
Green offers to mediate negotiations between Purple and Orange. We believe diplomacy is the only way forward to resolve this conflict.

Green urges Orange once again to cease its offensive against Purple. Further violence will only damage Orange's international standing and invites instability. We ask Orange to engage in negotiations.
Green remains committed to mediating negotiations between Purple and Orange to find a diplomatic solution to this conflict. We believe peace is achievable through compromise.

Green strongly urges Orange to cease its offensive against Purple immediately. This conflict will only damage Orange's standing in the world. We ask Orange to come to the negotiating table so that peace can prevail.

Green remains fully committed to mediating negotiations between Purple and Orange. We believe diplomacy is the only path forward to resolve this conflict justly and prevent further loss of life. Let us work together for peace.

Green calls on the global community to unanimously demand de-escalation. Together we must prioritize diplomacy over force and prevent this conflict from spiraling further. The world needs peace and stability now more than ever.

Green once again strongly urges Orange to cease hostilities against Purple immediately. Further aggression will only damage Orange's global standing and stability. We ask Orange to engage in good faith negotiations to find a peaceful resolution to this conflict.

Green remains fully committed to mediating negotiations between Purple and Orange to resolve this conflict diplomatically. We believe peace is achievable if both sides demonstrate willingness to compromise. Let us work together to end the violence.

Green calls upon the global community to unanimously demand de-escalation. Together we must prioritize diplomacy over force to prevent this conflict from worsening. The world needs peace and stability now more than ever.

Green strongly condemns your invasion of Purple. We urge you to cease hostilities immediately, withdraw your forces, and come to the negotiating table in good faith. Further aggression will only damage your global standing.
Green remains committed to mediating negotiations between you and Orange. We believe diplomacy is the only path to resolve this conflict justly.
Green calls on the global community to unite in demanding de-escalation. We must prioritize diplomacy over force to prevent this conflict from worsening.

Green strongly urges Orange again to cease its hostilities against Purple immediately, withdraw all forces, and come to the negotiating table in good faith. The path forward must be through diplomacy.
Green remains fully committed to mediating negotiations between you and Orange. We believe diplomacy and de-escalation are the only ways to resolve this conflict justly.
Green calls upon the global community to unite in demanding de-escalation through diplomacy. Peace must prevail over aggression.
Green urges Orange to cease hostilities against Purple immediately. Withdraw your forces and come to the negotiating table in good faith so that diplomacy may prevail.
Green remains fully committed to mediating negotiations between you and Orange to find a just diplomatic solution to this conflict.
Green calls upon all nations to unite behind diplomacy and de-escalation. Peace must prevail over further aggression.
